title: Caravan wraps successful journey
subtitle: Caravan wraps successful journey
body: CANTON, Ohio -- All week, Eric Wedge has been riding a bus.  But when the Indians Winter Caravan pulled into the Marriott McKinley Grand Hotel here Thursday morning, cars were on the mind of the Tribe manager.  The hotel's basement contains an impressive collection of about 100 rare, vintage cars, all of which are for sale. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
